trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>evento é desencadeado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar as alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>evento é desencadeado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementar uma origem para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>eventos, transmita `true` para `previousModeAutoSized` se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>já tinha um modo de redimensionamento automático e o novo modo é diferente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade foi anteriormente definida como qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade foi anteriormente definida como qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> foi anteriormente definido para redimensionar automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>classe é utilizada com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>eventos, pelo que esta propriedade está relacionada com especificamente o estado anterior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade foi anteriormente definida como qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade foi anteriormente definida como qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
